name: Rook Autoturret
name_ja: オートタレット・ルーク
help: Deploys A Single-target Battle Turret Which Will Deliver Auto-attacks With A Potency Of 80 To Its Master's Target. Using A Weaponskill Will Cause Turret To Change Targets. Hypercharge Potency: 160  Hypercharge Effect: Increases Target's Physical Damage Taken By 5%  Duration: 10s Shares A Recast Timer With Bishop Autoturret.
